snippet: Defending champion Novak Djokovic continued his dominance of Philipp Kohlschreiber, winning 7-5, 7-5 in the third round of the BNP Paribas Open on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Novak Djokovic continued his dominance of Philipp Kohlschreiber, winning 7-5, 7-5 in the third round of the BNP Paribas Open on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Williams Roll in Straight Sets at Indian Wells
headline.main: Djokovic, Williams Roll in Straight Sets at Indian Wells
